title: Startup Loop Stage Operator Dictionary
description: Canonical naming source for operator-facing stage labels, aliases, and display fields. Generated views (stage-operator-map.json, stage-operator-table.md) are derived from this dictionary. List order must match canonical stage order in loop-spec.yaml.

schema_version.description: Dictionary schema version. Increment when field definitions change.

loop_spec_version.description: The loop-spec.yaml spec_version this dictionary aligns to. Must be kept in sync.

stages.description: Ordered list of stage entries. Order must match the stages array order in loop-spec.yaml exactly.

id.description: Canonical stage ID from loop-spec.yaml (e.g. ASSESSMENT-09, MEASURE-01, S6B). Must match exactly.

name_machine.description: Lowercase kebab-case machine name. Stable key in generated views. No spaces.

label_operator_short.description: Short operator-facing label for compact surfaces. Maximum 28 characters.

label_operator_long.description: Full operator-facing label. Used in tables and status displays.

outcome_operator.description: What the operator has when this stage is done, expressed as a concrete deliverable.

aliases.description: Deterministic slug aliases for --stage-alias addressing. Must be globally unique across all stages in this dictionary. At least one alias required.

display_order.description: Integer position in operator-facing display. Matches index position in loop-spec.yaml stages array (1-based). Conditional sibling stages sharing a logical slot may share the same display_order.

conditional.description: True if this stage is conditional and not always executed.

condition.description: Condition expression when conditional=true (matches loop-spec.yaml condition field).

operator_next_prompt.description: Optional short prompt telling the operator what to do next after completing this stage.

operator_microsteps.description: Optional sub-steps visible to the operator within this stage. Required for composite stages (e.g. S6B with split gates).

id.description: Gate ID in canonical format (e.g. GATE-S6B-STRAT-01).

label.description: Operator-facing label for this microstep. Maximum 40 characters.

gate.description: Gate type. Hard = blocking; Soft = advisory.

description.description: What this microstep checks or enables for the operator.
